entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
